room_title: Escape room "Room 1867" by Escape Hays in Hays
review: We did the hotel room and it was SO fun! Very challenging and entertaining. The staff was amazing and so patient with us. My new favorite thing to do in Hays! I hope they continue to add rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Room 1867" by Escape Hays in Hays
review: Great time with the family!! We did the Hotel room - looking forward to going back & doing the CIA room!

room_title: Escape room "Room 1867" by Escape Hays in Hays
review: Escape Hays was wonderful. Very friendly staff! We did the motel room puzzle. It was very challenging but a ton of fun! Everything about this experience requires teamwork, communication, and problem solving. We had a blast and can't wait to try a new room!
